articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: North America and Asia May Collide Some 200 Million Years Later: Geophysicist | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Studies indicate that the Pacific Ocean decreases in size by a few centimeters every year and at this rate, our continents could collide with each other, forming a new continent called ‘Amasia’.
articles.content: Can you imagine calling yourself a traveller and then landing on an entirely different continent nearly 8000 kilometres away from your intended destination? It has been over 500 years since Christoph… [+2211 chars]

articles.title: Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy achieve career-best World No.2 ranking - India Today
articles.description: Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, the reigning Asian Champions, climbed one spot to world no. 2 in the latest BWF World Rankings released on Tuesday.
articles.content: By India Today Sports Desk: Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, India's top men's doubles pair, have risen to a career-high second place in the latest Badminton World Federation (BWF) rankings… [+1699 chars]

articles.title: Asian Games 2023: Bajrang Punia and Vinesh Phogat break silence after direct selection controversy - India Today
articles.description: Bajrang Punia and Vinesh Phogat have broken their silence on the Asian Games selection controversy and claimed that they were ready to take a step back from wrestling if proven wrong. The duo were given direct entry for the games, without having to go through…
